Passwords and passphrases

Strong passwords are hard

A memorable nonsensical sentence with numbers, punctuation, and at least one uncommon typo.

  • HarpersHareOutshinesHis2-PianoPolicy

Possibilities

  • minimum 20 characters long
  • alphanumeric
  • punctuation

Password creation schemes

  • Diceware
  • Subject-Object-Action
  • Hardbase-Suffix
